verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H1166>married<s%> her, and it <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass that she <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1697>some<s%> <S%H6172>uncleanness<s%> in her: then let him <S%H3789>write<s%> her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> her out of his <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And when she is <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> she may <S%H1980>go<s%> and be <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> wife.

And if the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> her, and <S%H3789>write<s%> her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce,<s%> and <S%H5414>gives<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7971>sends<s%> her out of his <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> her to be his <S%H802>wife;<s%>

Her <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1167>husband,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> her away, <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H7725>again<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that she is <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> for that is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and you shall not cause the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> he shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he be <S%H5674>charged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>business:<s%> but he shall be <S%H5355>free<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and shall <S%H8055>cheer<s%> up his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H3947>taken.<s%>

<S%H3808>No<s%> man shall <S%H2254>take<s%> the <S%H7347>nether<s%> or the <S%H7393>upper<s%> <S%H7347>millstone<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge:<s%> for he <S%H2254>takes<s%> a man's <S%H5315>life<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1589>stealing<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and makes <S%H6014>merchandise<s%> of him, or <S%H4376>sells<s%> him; then that <S%H1590>thief<s%> shall <S%H4191>die;<s%> and you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> that you <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3966>diligently,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> you: as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, so you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> after that you were <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you do <S%H5383>lend<s%> your <S%H7453>brother<s%> <S%H3972>any<s%> <S%H4859>thing,<s%> you shall not <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H5670>fetch<s%> his <S%H5667>pledge.<s%>
You shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> you do <S%H5383>lend<s%> shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> out the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> to you.
And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H6041>poor,<s%> you shall not <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H5667>pledge:<s%>

In any <S%H7725>case<s%> you shall <S%H7725>deliver<s%> him the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> <S%H935>down,<s%> that he may <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in his own <S%H8008>raiment,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you: and it shall be <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall not <S%H6231>oppress<s%> an <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant<s%> that is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> whether he be of your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> or of your <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that are in your <S%H776>land<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

At his <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H7939>hire,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H935>down<s%> on it; for he is <S%H6041>poor,<s%> and <S%H5375>sets<s%> his <S%H5315>heart<s%> on it: <S%H3808>lest<s%> he <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and it be <S%H2399>sin<s%> to you.

The <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall not be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1>fathers:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for his own <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> nor of the <S%H3490>fatherless;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2254>take<s%> a <S%H490>widow's<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge:<s%>

But you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you <S%H8033>there:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H7114>cut<s%> down your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in your <S%H7704>field,<s%> and have <S%H7911>forgot<s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> you shall not <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> it: it shall be for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> for the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow:<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H2251>beat<s%> your <S%H2132>olive<s%> tree, you shall not go over the <S%H6288>boughs<s%> <S%H310>again:<s%> it shall be for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> for the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H1219>gather<s%> the grapes of your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> you shall not <S%H5953>glean<s%> it <S%H310>afterward:<s%> it shall be for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> for the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H5650>slave<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>
